title: Fps Drops, game crashing and making my Pc Crach
body: Has Anyone else been having Fps drops as soon as you get into a game and then sometimes your game either crashes or it crashes your computer. if u know how to fix this plz help

replies.body:
Hey there,

Definitely sounds like this could be an issue with your GPU, however let's explore some potential solutions before we go down that road.

* Are your GPU drivers up to date (These can be downloaded from your GPU manufacturers website)
* Is Windows up to date?
* Try disabling any unneeded programs before playing next time.

If none of the above help, then it's possible your GPU could be experiencing a fault and/or overheating when you're playing league.

* How old is the computer?
* When was the last time you cleaned inside the system?

Could you monitor your temeperatures next time you're playing, there are many free tools to do this (My favourite being [SpeedFan](http://www.almico.com/speedfan.php)).
Please post back with your CPU/GPU temperatures before and after playing league for a short period of time.
i just started my computer and it says there at 511c and there staying like that

I'm going to assume you mistyped that and meant 51C as at 511C your computer would already be on fire.

What are your temperatures like when in-game?

There's definitely something far more odd happening here.

Have you tried reinstalling/updating your graphics drivers as suggested in my first post? If not, please do that and report back.
yes ive done that all up to date. i dont know what happening because its a new computer

Hey there,

As per our previous discussion in pvp.net chat and a repair not helping, what antivirus are you running?

Could you try disabling your antivirus temporarily and then running another repair, see if you're able to launch again.

From looking at your logs I've also noticed that your onboard graphics seem to be being used rather than the dedicated GPU in your system, from what I can tell you have an AMD GPU, there should be an option in the catalyst control centre for "switchable graphics application settings" please make sure league is set to use "High Performance".
